field.label: Enable WAN CARP Hook
field.help: Enable automatic WAN interface up/down switching on CARP master/backup transitions.

field.label: WAN Interface
field.help: Select the WAN interface to enable/disable on CARP state changes.

field.label: Trigger VHID
field.help: CARP Virtual Host ID (VHID) that triggers the WAN switch. Only events matching this VHID number will be processed (e.g. "1"). Leave empty to react to all CARP events.
